entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT , Vernon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:07 AM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vernon 3:00 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023
Temperature: 1.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 0.5°C
Wind: SE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning late this evening. Rain mixed with wet snow before morning. Snow level 1200 metres lowering to valley bottom before morning. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain or snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with wet snow changing to snow late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023
